org.mayanjun.mybatisx.api.query

Interface Query<T extends Serializable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardQuery

    public interface Query<T extends Serializable>
extends Serializable
    A query object encapsulate all the information about query data from database. Such as fields,where conditions,order by,limits,and pessimistic lock and so on.
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    mayanjun
